ygData.subject: Re: new spell!?!? (** spoiler **)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... your ... requirement, ... I just got on the test server over lunch and found the new spell Bonds of Force in Ak Anon.  It is a level 29 spell that is AE
ygData.messageBody:
> >"New Wizard Spell "Bonds of Force" on Wizard vendors."
> >"Research for Thunderclap (Wizard) is now correct - check your book"
> >"Research for Fire Spiral of Al'Kabor (Wizard) is now correct - check
your
> >book"
> logged on to the test server to see about our new spell, bonds of force,
> >but could not find it anywhere in neriak. if somebody else logs into the
> >test server, and finds the new spell, could u please post lvl
requirement,
> >skill, and mana cost?


I just got on the test server over lunch and found the new spell "Bonds of
Force" in Ak'Anon. It is a level 29 spell that is AE and takes 75 mana.

-Shadowwalker
